# CapturedElementCategory

**Enumeration**

The category of the particular object or surface.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CapturedElementCategory
```

## Overview

A  [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoomAttribute] adopter’s [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoomAttribute/parentCategory] property is of this type.

## Determining the category type

- **CapturedElementCategory.object(_:)**: A category that’s scoped to the captured object.
- **CapturedElementCategory.surface(_:)**: A category that’s scoped to the captured surface.

## Accessing object details

- **CapturedRoomAttribute**: Details about an object in the room that the framework observes during a scan.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
